author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-3304. Fixed intermittent test failure due to a race in TestRMContainerAllocator#testBlackListedNodes. Contributed by Ravi Prakash.

author: hlship
msg: Optimization: inject a ComputedValue, rather than use a full FieldConduit, when injecting common resources into a component
This is a bit more efficient, as fewer methods must be written, and fewer new fields created.
